select idx, userid, name, email, gradelevel , trunc(months_between(sysdate, lastlogindate)) AS lastlogindategap , trunc(months_between(sysdate, lastpwdchangedate)) AS pwdchangegap from MEMBER where status = 1 and userid = #{USERID} and pwd = #{PWD}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set lastlogindate = sysDate where userid = #{USERID}
